item.title: Southwest adds Turkish Airlines as sixth international partner
item.description: Southwest Airlines is partnering with Istanbul-based Turkish Airlines in its latest international partnership.

item.title: American to give older DCA Admirals Club a much-needed upgrade in 2026
item.description: American Airlines will renovate one of its Admirals Club lounges at Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport (DCA) beginning in 2026.

item.title: Jamaica is open and welcoming visitors
item.description: Two months after Category 5 Hurricane Melissa made landfall, Jamaica's tourism and hotels are ready to welcome visitors.
